kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments if ``condition`` is false.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.
kw.msg: Starting process: adb -s emulator-5554 shell pm clear com.flashcoffee

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Register Keyword To Run On Failure
kw.doc: Sets the keyword to execute when a AppiumLibrary keyword fails.
kw.msg: Capture Page Screenshot will be run on failure.

kw.name: Get Element Size
kw.doc: Get element size

kw.name: Get Dictionary Values
kw.doc: Returns values of the given ``dictionary`` as a list.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Get Top Height General On Home
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Log Source
kw.doc: Logs and returns the entire html source of the current page or frame.
